Get VennPlotData slot

Source: R/process_data.R
venn_data.Rd

Get VennPlotData slot

Prepare Venn data

venn_region(obj)

venn_setedge(obj)

venn_setlabel(obj)

process_setEdge_data(venn)

process_setLabel_data(venn)

process_region_data(venn)

Arguments

obj

a S4 class `VennPlotData` object
venn

a Venn object

Value

a tibble, `sf` object

a tibble

Examples

if (FALSE) {
# obj is VennPlotData
venn_region(obj)   # return region data
venn_setlabel(obj) # return setLabel data
venn_setedge(obj)  # return setEdge data
}
x <- list(
A = sample(letters, 8),
B = sample(letters, 8),
C = sample(letters, 8),
D = sample(letters, 8)
)

venn <- Venn(x)
process_region_data(venn)

#> # A tibble: 15 × 5
#>    component id    item      count name      
#>    <chr>     <chr> <list>    <int> <chr>     
#>  1 region    1     <chr [1]>     1 A         
#>  2 region    2     <chr [1]>     1 B         
#>  3 region    3     <chr [1]>     1 C         
#>  4 region    4     <chr [3]>     3 D         
#>  5 region    12    <chr [2]>     2 A..B      
#>  6 region    13    <chr [2]>     2 A..C      
#>  7 region    14    <chr [0]>     0 A..D      
#>  8 region    23    <chr [0]>     0 B..C      
#>  9 region    24    <chr [1]>     1 B..D      
#> 10 region    34    <chr [0]>     0 C..D      
#> 11 region    123   <chr [1]>     1 A..B..C   
#> 12 region    124   <chr [0]>     0 A..B..D   
#> 13 region    134   <chr [1]>     1 A..C..D   
#> 14 region    234   <chr [2]>     2 B..C..D   
#> 15 region    1234  <chr [1]>     1 A..B..C..D
process_setEdge_data(venn)

#> # A tibble: 4 × 5
#>   component id    item         count name 
#>   <chr>     <chr> <named list> <int> <chr>
#> 1 setEdge   1     <chr [8]>        8 A    
#> 2 setEdge   2     <chr [8]>        8 B    
#> 3 setEdge   3     <chr [8]>        8 C    
#> 4 setEdge   4     <chr [8]>        8 D    
process_setLabel_data(venn)

#> # A tibble: 4 × 3
#>   component id    name 
#>   <chr>     <chr> <chr>
#> 1 setLabel  1     A    
#> 2 setLabel  2     B    
#> 3 setLabel  3     C    
#> 4 setLabel  4     D
